name: Resilient Touch
summary: Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows.
description:
Your healing energies create an aura of protection that defends your allies against more than just blades and arrows. An ally that recovers Hit Points from your lay on hands gains a +1 status bonus to their saving throws until the end of their next turn.Archetype Use

This feat can be used for one or more Archetypes in addition to the listed Classes. When selected this way, the feat is not considered to have its class traits.
